title: Christina Anstead reveals she declared she would marry husband Ant 'a week after we met'
text:
She gave birth to their first child two months ago.

And Christina Anstead commemorated the date she first spoke to Ant Anstead, the future father of her son Hudson in a sweet Instagram post on Tuesday.

The 36-year-old reality TV star began the post: '2 years ago today this guy called me for the first time'.

Shock and aww: Christina Anstead commemorated the date she first spoke to Ant Anstead, the future father of her son Hudson in a sweet Instagram post on Tuesday.

'I called my friend @claytonjennings1 and asked him to pray for me,' continued the Flip or Flop personality.

'He prayed I would find a man who treated me and my kids with love and respect, that I would no longer play small, I would step into the life I deserved and that from that day forward everything would begin to fall into place.'

'The next day I woke up with a text from a friend of ours named Walter who had just met Ant and thought we were the perfect fit. 2 kids, similar careers, just gone through a divorce and he was a really NICE guy.'

Blonde beauty: The 36-year-old reality TV star began the post: '2 years ago today this guy called me for the first time'. Seen here in May 2019

'Seemed too good to be true, but the timing of the Clayton call seemed like Fate was dealing me a lucky hand. 10/29 Ant called me and 11/2 we went on our first date.'

'We have literally been inseparable ever since.

'I told my dad at a hockey game a week after we met that we were going to get married. He said “well if you are saying it then you probably are” [LAUGH CRYING EMOJI].'

'Now 2 years later - married with a wonderful blended family, careers we both love and beautiful baby boy. Life has a funny way of letting things fall into place when you least expect it,' concluded Christina.

'And just like that - #6weekspostpartum... first day back to the gym and it feels SO good to be back,' she wrote. 'Taking it SLOW and Working out 3 days a week is my goal right now. Lucky I get to do it with my bestie @shanrbeauty who has a baby boy as well'

Doing her best: She told her Instagram followers that Hudson is a 'tough baby' and being a mom to a newborn is no easy task

The happy couple gave birth to son Hudson back in August of this year.

Earlier this month, the TV star took to Instagram to share a selfie while celebrating her return to a fitness facility.

'And just like that - #6weekspostpartum... first day back to the gym and it feels SO good to be back,' she wrote. 'Taking it SLOW and Working out 3 days a week is my goal right now. Lucky I get to do it with my bestie @shanrbeauty who has a baby boy as well.

'I cannot express the importance of self care enough - exercise is my stress reliever and everyone is happier when mama is happier!'

She told her Instagram followers that Hudson is a 'tough baby' and being a mom to a newborn is no easy task.

'Newborn life is hard. It’s not all Instagram filters of perfection that people put out there. F that. That’s so misleading for new moms,' she wrote.

Adorable: Hudson was born on Sept. 6 and regularly appears on his mother's social feeds

Siblings! The Christina on the Coast star has two children with her ex-husband Tarek El Moussa; daughter Taylor Reese, nine, and son Brayden James, four

And as she prepares to go back to work filming her HGTV show, in two weeks, she is prepared for life 'to get even more crazy.'

The Christina on the Coast star has two children with her ex-husband Tarek El Moussa; daughter Taylor Reese, nine, and son Brayden James, four.

Tarek and Christina split in 2016 and finalized a divorce in January 2018.

She went on to marry English television presenter Ant Anstead with a wedding at their home on Dec. 22, 2018; he has two children from a previous marriage.
description: Christina Anstead commemorated the date she first spoke to Ant Anstead, the future father of her son Hudson in a sweet Instagram post on Tuesday.
